it was fun until all my npc party member decided to stop attacking and sit out every single fight played with tactics reset to defaults reloaded tried mods  bugfixes you name it so if you get lucky and your game behaves the way its meant to then yes i recommend  the story is interesting and the mechanics are fun but good luck  youre rolling the dice as to whether you get a fun game or a bug filled mess
